original_text: Now I will bring them back from the places to which you sold them. I will do to you what you have done to them.
korean_text: 보라 내가 그들을 너희가 팔아 이르게 한 곳에서 일으켜 나오게 하고 너희가 행한 것을 너희 머리에 돌려서

sentences.original_text: Now I will bring them back
from the places to which you sold them
what you have done to them
